parts.name: Mercedes W211 / W220 Suspension Parts on LX/LD
parts.description: The Chrysler LX platform (Charger, 300, Magnum, Challenger) borrows heavily from Mercedes-Benz architecture. Many front suspension components are shared with the W220 S-Class, and the rear suspension is derived from the W211 E-Class.
specs: Front Upper Control Arms: Similar to W220

parts.name: SRT8 Brembo Brake Swap
parts.description: The 4-piston (2006-2014) or 6-piston (2015+) Brembo brakes from SRT8/Hellcat models can be swapped onto lower trim Chargers/Challengers (R/T, SXT).
specs: Requires SRT Knuckles (Spindles) for the calipers to bolt up

parts.name: Charger / Challenger / 300 Seat Swap
parts.description: Front seats are physically interchangeable between all LX/LD/LC/LA cars (Charger, Challenger, 300, Magnum). You can put Hellcat seats in a V6 Charger, or 300 seats in a Magnum.
specs: Rails bolt directly to the floor
Wiring connectors changed around 2011 (pre-facelift vs post-facelift)

parts.name: Getrag Limited Slip Diff Swap
parts.description: The Getrag LSD differentials found in SRT8 models (2009+) are a popular upgrade for R/T models equipped with open differentials (215mm or 226mm axles).
specs: Requires swapping axles/hubs if moving from 215mm to 226mm Getrag
Significantly stronger than the open diffs
